subject: p15192710
History: History of AML status post allograft status post bronchoscopy. Assess for interval change. Comparison made to prior study of at 8:33. Single portable AP upright chest film dated at 14:50 is submitted.
Impression: There is persistent subcutaneous emphysema within the lateral soft tissues. No pneumothorax is appreciated. Left lower lobe pleural-based opacity appears essentially stable. Overall cardiac and mediastinal contours are unchanged in the setting of relatively low lung volumes. No evidence of pulmonary edema.
